item.title: Gradient-Sign Masking for Task Vector Transport Across Pre-Trained Models
item.description: arXiv:2510.09658v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: When a new release of a foundation model is published, practitioners typically need to repeat full fine-tuning, even if the same task has already been solved in the previous version.
